name: Box Game
description:
Box Game is a 2D platformer and shooter, two players are required to play this game.

With three weapons, two boxes and one map, two players play against each other to be the final winner within 3 rounds. They can use the varied arsenal against the other but there's a catch: at the end of each round, each player must sacrifice a weapon to continue the fight.

This game can be played on keyboard (note: for player 2, use the 0 number keypad for dart attack, NOT 2):

Or with two controllers  :

Made by Severin Jacob and Thierryc Guillerme. Original music "Sacrifice" by Luc Bordas.

This project was made during the Ludum Dare 43 game jam based on the theme "Sacrifices must be made".
